entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
